availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Bradford F. Cantrell (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Cantrell and Hannah Cantrell. Married to Elvira A. Dunning Cantrell. Father of Rodolphus Cantrell, Henry Cantrell, and Edward H. Cantrell. Married to Mary E. Adams Cantrell in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on September 6, 1864. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Household owned sixteen enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Owned eight enslaved persons in Caldwell County in 1860.
